                                                     java.lang.String current_dir)
Create an options folder if one doesn't exists (for backwards user compatibility, and then create the path to the options folder. If that doesn't exists then the method calling this method is responsible for creating it.

createDefaultVector

public java.util.Hashtable createDefaultVector(java.lang.String type)
Create the default values for the ROT and ROTD vectors, and store them in the xml file. Times are based on these millisecond values. seconds- 10000 minutes- 60000 hours - 3600000 days - 86400000

reverseEditROT

public void reverseEditROT(java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String option_name,
                           java.lang.String rot_level,
                           java.lang.String grade,
                           java.lang.String user_id,
                           java.lang.String subject,
                           java.lang.String current_dir)
Similar to the edit method, but here we increment twice for a passed test, or decrement twice for a failed test to reverse a previous test which would have had the opposite grade that is passed in here. RateOfTesting will reverse the grade for us.

Specified by:
reverseEditROT in interface ROTStorage
Parameters:
option_name - either ROTCOnstants.ROT or ROTConstants.ROTD
rot_level -
grade -
user_id -
subject -
